head.supplied: ¶ [Mr P. Ramel informs the Society that Dr F. Mueller, of Melbourne, in a private letter, announces that he is sending to the London zoo various Australian animals, some of which are for our Garden o...

div.p:
Letter not found. For the text given here, see the report of the meeting of the Société zoologique d'acclimatation of 30 October 1863, Bulletin de la société zoologique d'acclimatation (1863), vol. 10, p. 697. The letter is unlikely to have been sent later than August 1863.
[M. P. Ramel informe la Société que M. le docteur F. Mueller, de Melbourne, dans une lettre particulière, lui annonce qu'il envoie au jardin zoologique de Londres divers animaux d'Australie, dont quelques-uns sont destinés à notre Jardin d'acclimatation.]

[Mr P. Ramel informs the Society that Dr F. Mueller, of Melbourne, in a private letter, announces that he is sending to the London zoo various Australian animals, some of which are for our Garden of acclimatization.]
